modName: Good Looking Characters Part III - Male High Elf - Arias
summary: A save game featuring a badass looking male Altmer
descriptionHtml:
Its really hard to nail a good looking High Elf,seriously... :p
The save starts just at the begening when you enter the Helgen Keep with Hadvar.
You can use the \"showracemenu\" console command,if you want to change some parts of the appeareace,
such as haircut,facial hair and the name ofcourse,it wont damage the save game because its the start.

The mods you need for the savegames to look like in screenshots(install them in this order):

For Males:
----------
XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356

Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488
PS.Only the optional \"Underware - Default\" file.

High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4141

ApachiiSkyHair
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

-------------------------------------------------------

For Females:
------------
Beauty Faces for females
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1329

DIMONIZED UNP female body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
or
CBBE By Caliente
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

ApachiiSkyHair
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

^
Those are the required files for my savegames...
And if you wonder about the screenshot quality.
I use all the popular HD textures from Skyrimnexus,Nvidia SSAO with ENB HDR 1.8,with my own custom preset
and heavily modified Skyrim.ini file :)
author: zex89
